name: Hiddenverse: Tale of Ariadna
summary: Hiddenverse - Tale of Ariadna puts you in the role of regulator - one responsible for keeping various worlds in balance. As the world is threatened by chaos, the love of your partner, Seuss, has gone missing. Discover a trail of clues that lead deep into the heart of disorder. The fate of the world, and Seuss's lost love, are mysteriously entwined. Explore Hiddenverse - Tale of Ariadna today!
